body.name: NapQueen 8 Inch Queen Size Mattress, Bamboo Charcoal Memory Foam Mattress, Bed in a Box
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 17 hrs 37 mins
features: Size: Designed to fit standard queen size mattress box type beds (dimensions specified).
Material: Made with CertiPUR-US certified mattress foams & OEKO-TEX Standard 100 textiles ensuring long-lasting comfort and support.

Packaging: With our advanced technology, we expertly compress the mattress into a single box, making shipping and maneuvering hassle-free. Upon unboxing, simply unroll the mattress, and it will take care of the rest. Within a span of 72 hours, it will effortlessly expand to its original shape, ready for a night of comfortable sleep.

Easy Inflation: The mattress can be easily inflated within the stipulated time frame under normal room temperature conditions.However, in colder areas, it may require a slightly longer time for full inflation. Please allow for proper acclimation in colder climates. Simply follow the provided instructions for inflation, and it will expand to its full size and shape.

Firmness: Medium Firm mattress designed to provide superior comfort and support. The mattress offers a balanced combination of firmness and cushioning, ensuring proper spinal alignment and pressure relief.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Next page 1 Support 2 Foam 3 Firmness Level 4 The Product
Previous page Next page 1 Unboxing 2 Size & Sleeping Positions 3 Our Story

Does this memory foam mattress require a specific type of bed frame or foundation? No specific frame is required. However, a solid, flat foundation or slatted base with slats less than 3 inches apart is recommended for optimal support. Will the mattress have a strong chemical smell upon unboxing? There might be a faint "new mattress" smell upon unboxing. It's non-toxic and should dissipate within a few days if aired properly. How long does it take for the mattress to fully expand after unboxing? Typically, the mattress expands within 24-72 hours. For best results, allow it to expand in a well-ventilated area. Can I machine wash the mattress cover? Typically, removable covers can be machine washed on a gentle cycle and air-dried for best results. Is this mattress CertiPUR-US certified? Yes, it's CertiPUR-US certified for safety and performance.

Complete Your Bedroom Setup Bed Frame Mattress Mattress Topper Noise Free Modular Design Heavy Duty Metal Platform Bed Frame, Easy Assembly, Sturdy & up to 3000lbs 8" Charlotte Twin Size Made with CertiPUR-US certified mattress foams & OEKO-TEX Standard 100 textiles. 4'' Standard Mattress Topper Memory Foam Mattress Topper Special Feature No Box Spring Needed, Fade Resistant, Squeak Resistant, Stain Resistant Fill Material Bamboo Charcoal Infused Memory Foam, High Density Foam, Cotton, Polyester Lightweight and Breathable This topper has a light, comfy texture, creating a nice and constant air flow.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value and is pretty high quality
reviews.reviewText: Waited to write this review until after a few weeks—I’ll update after a few months. So far this is a quality inexpensive mattress. I use it with a foam pad underneath because the mattress slips on my bed frame. I don’t think a pad is needed for sleep. This is fairly firm but conforms to your body.Arrived rolled in a box—fully expanded in about an hour.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Way better than I expected for the cost
reviews.reviewText: I got the 8 inch twin mattress to go in a Montessori Bed for my toddler and it's perfect. Very comfortable, great quality, and 8 inches left enough spacing for the rails so he doesn't roll off the bed. You can't get a mattress better than this for the price. It did have weird corners like other reviewers mentioned but it doesn't impact the bed at all, the sheets still fit and hold.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Qualify mattress on a budget. worth it!
reviews.reviewText: i bought this mattress in 2022 and so far i love it and worth purchasing. Very comfortable and good amount of firmness. I do which it was thicker for the height only because my bed frame is short but other i will be buying a box spring to add height. if you are on the budget i recommend this mattress you will be suppressed that it's a good quality mattress

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Never fully inflated
reviews.reviewText: It never fully inflated, I would recommend if you going to buy again because one bad bed doesn’t affect the rest of the good beds! I might buy another one but bigger… good quality! And awesome comfort beds!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was really happy with this purchase. This was for the top bunk for my 6yo, so we didn’t want to spend a lot or go to a store and go through the delivery process. The memory foam is firmer than expected, I am assuming because it will soften over time. My 6yo says it’s comfy and the short time I’ve been in it, it seems comfy too. The memory foam seems to be good quality. We let it sit out and expand for three days

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for toddler
reviews.reviewText: We decided to upgrade my 3.5 yo bed to a twin. After searching we got this. It’s comfortable enough that I and my husband can lay with him when he asks before bed. It was easy to open and setup and inflated pretty quickly once we opened it. I’m not sure if I would choose it for an adult, but it’s 10/10 for my toddler.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars You get what you pay for
reviews.reviewText: This mattress is firm. It didn't expand the way they depict online. The sides are lumpy, not flat/smooth. Overall it will work for short-stay guests. I'm not packing it back up and shipping it back, but i will be buying another 3" memory foam topper for it. Don't get it as your full-time bed. It's also is impossible to find nice standard (not deep pocket) sheets at a reasonable price. Spend the extra cash and get more than an 8 inch mattress. The way I see it, my guests are staying at no cost, so they get what they pay for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Firmer and supportive- ✅Soft and plushy- 🚫Purchased 3 of these mattresses.This memory foam starts firm, and for lightweight bodies remains pretty firm even a year later. The more weight, the more you sink in, but never fully melts into the bed nor does it brea down and lose integrity. Good integrity of the product, I would say. If you’re looking a bed to melt into, this one maybe isn’t you.
